clinical_study.brief_title: Envarsus® Once Daily With Everolimus in Elderly Kidney Transplant Recipients: Pharmacokinetic and Clinical Study
clinical_study.official_title: Envarsus® Tablets Administered Once Daily in Combination With Everolimus in Elderly De-novo Kidney Transplant Recipients: Open-label, Multicentre, Single-arm, Pharmacokinetic and Clinical Study

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective, single-arm, open-label, multicentre study with the principal aim to estimate tacrolimus pharmacokinetic parameters in elderly de-novo kidney transplant recipients of ECD (Extended Criteria Donor) kidney grafts treated with Envarsus® prolonged release tablets in combination with everolimus tablets.

primary_outcome.measure: Tacrolimus Area Under the curve at 24 hours (AUC24)

secondary_outcome.measure: Tacrolimus within-patient variability of blood trough level
Time to reach therapeutic exposure to tacrolimus
Renal function using estimated glomerular filtration rate

secondary_outcome.description: Number of days between the first and the last renal replacement session

secondary_outcome.measure: Tacrolimus Tmax (time that the drug is present at the maximum concentration in serum)
Tacrolimus Average whole blood drug concentration (Cave)
Tacrolimus linear correlation coefficient between Cmin and AUC24

arm_group.arm_group_label: Envarsus once a day, everolimus b.i.d.
arm_group.description: Tacrolimus tablets at starting dose of 0.07 mg/kg/day will be administered once daily in the morning. Everolimus tablets at starting dose of 2 mg/day (1 mg b.i.d.) will be administered twice daily, every 12 hours.
